Misty Court was a humble and perpetually foggy street in the Tumbledown district of Baldurs Gates Outer City.
In the summer of the , on Kythorn 28, was visited by Tav, an adventuring detective who was investigating a series of grizzly murders. One of the dead bodies was fished out of River Chionthar, wrapped in a tarp taken from one of the workshops on Misty Court. Tav found the open-air stonemasons workshop called Alabaster Stonecrafts. The twins who ran the workshop told the investigator that strange happenings had been plaguing the nearby Cliffside Cemetery, claiming that the gravedigger â€“ Grom Skullsmash, was responsible, or the ghosts.
*Alabaster Stonecrafts, the workshop of "Sister" and "Brother Alabaster" in the late 15 century DR.
